MAIN.HEADLINE: Achievements
MAIN.DESC-1: Place where you do the tasks in games

LOL.HEADLINE: League of Legends
LOL.DESC-1: The most popular game in the world

DOTA2.HEADLINE: Dota 2
DOTA2.DESC-1: The game with the biggest prize pool

ITEM-1.ANSWER-1: It's a website, thats to which you'll be able to do specific tasks within a game for a reward.

ITEM-2.QUESTION-1: In which games I can do the tasks?
ITEM-2.ANSWER-1: Currently supported games are: League of Legends and Dota 2.

ITEM-3.ANSWER-1: The reward is experience, thanks to which you'll unlock more difficult tasks.

ITEM-4.QUESTION-1: In what kind of matches I'm allowed to complete the tasks?
ITEM-4.ANSWER-1: In League of Legends only in Ranked SOLO or FLEX.

PERMISSIONS.UNAUTHORIZED: You need to be logged in.

REGISTER.ACCEPT-TOS: By signing up you agree to

VALIDATORS.DIFFERENT-FROM: New password needs to be different then the old one.

DISCONNECTED.HEADER-1: You don't have a summoner connected to your account.
DISCONNECTED.HEADER-2: Please enter your summoner info in order to start the verification process.

CONNECTED.HEADER-1: Here is your connected summoner to your account.
CONNECTED.INFO-1: You need to prove that you summoner account belongs to you.
CONNECTED.INFO-2: Name one of your Mastery Pages with the following code:
CONNECTED.INFO-3: After that hit the Verify button below.
CONNECTED.INFO-4: Note: It can take a couple of minutes to update your data.

DISCONNECT-CONFIRM.TITLE: Disconnect the account
DISCONNECT-CONFIRM.DESC: Are you sure you want to remove a connection with your League of Legends summoner? This process will cancel all in progress tasks.

NEW-TASK.TIMES-INPUT-LABEL: Do this task the following number of times in a game

ERROR-MESSAGES.NO-TASKS: There is no IN_PROGRESS tasks to validate.
ERROR-MESSAGES.NO-GAMES: There is no recent games to validate.
ERROR-MESSAGES.API-LIMIT: Didn't verify all the recent games due to Riot servers being busy.
ERROR-MESSAGES.MUST-CONNECT: You must turn on sharing public matches in your client.

CANCEL-TASK.HEADER-1: Do you really want to cancel this task?
CANCEL-TASK.HEADER-2: If so, then please provide a reason.

CONNECTED.HEADER-1: Here is your connected Steam account.

DISCONNECT-CONFIRM.TITLE: Disconnect the account
DISCONNECT-CONFIRM.DESC: Are you sure you want to remove a connection with your Dota 2 account? This process will cancel all in progress tasks.

DISCONNECTED.HEADER-1: You don't have a Steam account connected to Dota 2.
DISCONNECTED.HEADER-2: Hit the 'Verify' button below to start the verification process.

DEFAULT-VALIDATOR-MESSAGES.MIN: This value must be greater or equal than {{value}}
DEFAULT-VALIDATOR-MESSAGES.MAX: This value must be smaller or equal than {{value}}
DEFAULT-VALIDATOR-MESSAGES.MIN-MAX: This value must be between {{minValue}} and {{maxValue}}

tl-1.NAME: Big fish
tl-1.DESC: Score a Penta Kill killing 5 enemies in a short amount of time.

tl-2.NAME: A Walking Terror
tl-2.DESC: Score a Quadra Kill killing 4 enemies in a short amount of time.

tl-3.NAME: Killing Machine
tl-3.DESC: Score a Triple Kill killing 3 enemies in a short amount of time.

tl-4.NAME: Start from scratch
tl-4.DESC: Score a Double Kill killing 2 enemies in a short amount of time.

td-1.NAME: Walking Death
td-1.DESC: Deal at least 100 000 damage to other heroes in a match.

td-2.NAME: I'll kill everyone
td-2.DESC: Deal at least 70 000 damage to other heroes in a match.

td-3.NAME: Mediocare bomber
td-3.DESC: Deal at least 50 000 damage to other heroes in a match.

td-4.NAME: I'm so afraid
td-4.DESC: Deal at least 20 000 damage to other heroes in a match.
